document.full_text: the three cities vying for the 2018 winter olympics found reason for celebration tuesday after the ioc issued a report evaluating their bid plans less than two months before the vote.
document.title: ioc issues report on 2018 winter games bid cities
lines_and_colors: the three cities vying for the 2018 winter olympics found reason for celebration tuesday after the ioc issued a report evaluating their bid plans less than two months before the vote.
